title: MRP Ramp Control add cartridges for FOX 38 and RockShox ZEB long-travel enduro forks
content:
MRP have added Ramp Control cartridges (RCC) for the all-new FOX 38 and RockShox ZEB enduro forks. As the name suggests, the MRP Ramp Control allows the rider to tune their fork’s end-stroke progression (aka Ramp) on the fly with 16 clicks of adjustment. Sounds a bit like a volume spacer, right?
